>>== MODE ==>>
citation
<<== MODE ==<<


>>== RESULT ==>>
Ibid. :: ALT
<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <title>Test fixture</title>
    <id>http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture</id>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture" rel="self"/>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/documentation/text" rel="documentation"/>
    <category citation-format="author-date"/>
    <updated>2014-04-30T13:19:38+00:00</updated>
    <rights license="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/">This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License</rights>
  </info>
  <macro name="main-render">
    <choose>
      <if variable="edition" match="none">
        <text term="ibid"/>
      </if>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="main-not-render">
    <choose>
      <if variable="edition" match="any">
        <text term="ibid"/>
      </if>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="alternative">
    <text value="ALT"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
       <group delimiter=" :: ">
         <text macro="main-render" alternative-macro="alternative"/>
         <text macro="main-not-render" alternative-macro="alternative"/>
       </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "title": "Hello", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
